sentences.english: Duggan, a father of four, died of a single gunshot wound to the chest, an inquest at north London Coroner's Court heard on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 驗屍報告稱，這位四歲小孩的父親被槍擊中胸腔致死。

sentences.english: They were never autopsied, and the cause of death remained unknown.
sentences.chinese: 但是並沒有進行驗屍，死因不明。

sentences.english: In fact, his friends are calling for his body to be exhumed and tested by toxicologists !
sentences.chinese: 事實上，他的朋友現正要求毒物專家來開棺驗屍。

sentences.english: After the death of Chung Ling Soo, the autopsy report indicated this is a "accidental death."
sentences.chinese: 程連蘇死後，驗屍報告註明這是個“意外死亡”。

sentences.english: A preliminary coroner's report indicated Fiore was strangled.
sentences.chinese: 初步驗屍報告顯示，菲奧雷被勒死。

sentences.english: The coroner gives a look of encouragement to the juror and the accused girl wails.
sentences.chinese: 但驗屍官給了狄更斯和哭號的女犯一個鼓勵的眼神。

sentences.english: A post mortem examination has been carried out but further toxicology tests are required.
sentences.chinese: 驗屍報告已經出來，但還需要進一步的毒理測試。

sentences.english: An autopsy is being conducted to determine the cause of his death.
sentences.chinese: 目前驗屍官正在進行解剖，以確定其死因。

sentences.english: In consequence, the number of postmortems has fallen quickly.
sentences.chinese: 結果驗屍的數量驟然下降。

sentences.english: The figures are in a report by the State Coroner.
sentences.chinese: 這些數據來自於州總驗屍官的一份報告。

sentences.english: The corpse was disinterred and re-examined by the coroner.
sentences.chinese: 屍體被掘出來，由驗屍官重新驗屍。

sentences.english: The corpse was disinterred and re-examined by the coroner.
sentences.chinese: 屍體被掘出來，由驗屍官重新驗屍。

sentences.english: A coroner recently confirmed in an autopsy report that the death was a suicide.
sentences.chinese: 驗屍官最近在一份驗屍報告中確認死亡原因爲自殺。

sentences.english: A coroner recently confirmed in an autopsy report that the death was a suicide.
sentences.chinese: 驗屍官最近在一份驗屍報告中確認死亡原因爲自殺。

sentences.english: When John passed away, the coroner’s office took all his clothes.
sentences.chinese: 約翰過世的時候，驗屍官拿走了他的所有衣物。

sentences.english: A postmortem found she had died of water intoxication.
sentences.chinese: 驗屍判定她死於水中毒。

definition: to meet violent death/to get killed
to examine a wound or injury (typically for forensic purposes)
on trial (for a crime)/to stand trial
to beat sb at their own game (idiom)
to pursue/to be after/to hunt down (the perpetrator of a crime, an escaped prisoner etc)
